newsitem.title: HUNGARY: Hungary's Globus rally goes on.
newsitem.headline: Hungary's Globus rally goes on.

text.p: Shares in Hungarian tinned food and fruit juice manufacturer Globus Rt continued their bull run to a new record high of 2,780 forints on Wednesday amid continuous demand for the paper, traders said.
At 1053 GMT Globus traded at 2,750 forints, up 250.
"There's market talk that good news will be announced shortly about Globus," one trader said. "But nobody knows exactly what it will be."
Globus shares have been on a strong upward trend in the past few days, rising to the current levels from last Friday's closing price of 2,100 forints.
